sentences.sContent: This system is enshrined in our Constitution.
sentences.sCn: 我们的宪法使该制度神圣而不可侵犯。

sentences.sContent: The apartheid system which enshrined racism in law still existed.
sentences.sCn: 以法律形式保护种族主义的种族隔离制度依然存在着。

synos.tran: 铭记，珍藏；把…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣

remMethod.val: en(进入) + shrine(圣地) → 进入圣地 → 奉为神圣

trans.tranOther: If something such as an idea or a right is enshrined in something such as a constitution or law, it is protected by it
